document_data.name: The Stranger's Log
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Stranger's Log''''' was a ledger kept by the [[Red Plumes]] that recorded every person who entered the city of [[Hillsfar]].
document_data.Description: ''The Stranger's Log'' was a huge tome that rested on a stone stand near the gate of Hillsfar.
document_data.History: Anyone wishing to enter Hillsfar was challenged by the Red Plumes at the gates and asked their reason for entry. Those allowed to enter the city paid a fee of 2 [[gp]] and their names and physical descriptions were recorded into ''The Stranger's Log''.
